com.mygdx.game.controller

Class ElementBody

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.controller.ElementBody
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BatBody, BubbleBody, BulletBody, HeroBody, MapTileBody, SnailBody

    public abstract class ElementBody
extends java.lang.Object
    ElementBody is class that creates keeps information about the body and fixtures of the entity. it has the methods to create the fixtures of the body and defines it's type and position.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ElementBody

        public ElementBody(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world,
                   ElementModel model,
                   com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.BodyDef.BodyType bodyType)
        Constructor that defines a body, sets it's position and type and adds it it's data(model).
        Parameters:
        world - the physics world
        model - the model of the element to be used in the super class constructor
        bodyType - Dynamic or Kinematic were the ones used

    • Method Detail

      • createExtraFixtures

        public void createExtraFixtures(float width,
                                float height)
        Creates extra fixtures for the body. This fixtures, one above and other under, will serve to check collisions in certain areas and with certain bodies.
        Parameters:
        width - width of the body
        height - height of the body

      • getX

        Returns the x coordinate of the current position of the body.

        Returns:
